WHERE "ZPOD_DATE" BETWEEN TO_DATE(EXTRACT (YEAR FROM ADD_YEARS(CURRENT_DATE,-3))||'0101','YYYYMMDD') AND TO_DATE(EXTRACT (YEAR FROM ADD_YEARS(CURRENT_DATE,0))||'1231','YYYYMMDD')

sink.preCopyScript:
DECLARE @DATE DATE, @THREEY DATE;
SET @DATE = GETDATE()
SET @THREEY = DATEADD(YY, DATEDIFF(YY, 0, @DATE) -3, 0)

DELETE FROM [BDH-SQL-NAM-COM-DART].[STG].[STG_STO_ANALYSIS]
WHERE CAST([DOC_DATE] AS DATE) >= @THREEY

DECLARE @DATE DATE, @THREEY DATE;
SET @DATE = GETDATE()
SET @THREEY = DATEADD(YY, DATEDIFF(YY, 0, @DATE) -3, 0)

DELETE FROM [BDH-SQL-NAM-COM-DART].[STG].[STG_DAILY_SALES]
WHERE CAST([ZPOD_DATE] AS DATE) >= @THREEY

sink.preCopyScript:
DECLARE @DATE DATE, @THREEY DATE;
SET @DATE = GETDATE()
SET @THREEY = DATEADD(YY, DATEDIFF(YY, 0, @DATE) -3, 0)

DELETE FROM [BDH-SQL-NAM-COM-DART].[STG].[STG_OPERATIONS_REPORTING]
WHERE CAST([CALMONTH]+'01' AS DATE) >= @THREEY
